title: Shenfu injection alleviate gut ischemia/reperfusion injury after severe hemorrhagic shock through improving intestinal microcirculation in rats
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Tianfeng Hua, Zongqing Lu, Minjie Wang, Yijun Zhang, Yuqian Chu, Yue Liu, Wenyan Xiao, Wuming Zhou, Xuanxuan Cui, Wei Shi, Jin Zhang, Min Yang
